descriptor: M's mother asks Dr B to introduce his son to M
R goes to the kitchen + takes the opportunity to listen to the conversation
Their mom calls their father for help...
R takes the bat out of his dad's hands and go with !
R makes a diversion by going to sing happy birthday to his father w all the guests
Ra shows Pb her new tattoo, but Pb hasn't done her !
J and C continue their conversation about J wanting to leave
M and Dr B discuss their relationship announcement
Ra and Pb show their tattoos and Ra gets mad at Pb
R enters when Ra shows her tattoo + R is gaga...
C and J fight over the foosball table
C loses and leaves the apartment
guys help J moved his stuff
C and J say goodbye and J decides to leave him the foosball table
after hugging C, J leaves the apartment
M's father visits her and reassures her of her choice
